defenders.pose: pose holds the position of each battery

missiles.launched: binary. Tells if this missile was already launched
missiles.target: int. The target id for this missile

Matrices: Matrices used in internal environment functions
defenders: columns are [id, x, y, velocity, direction, health, num of missiles, target_id]
defender missiles: columns are [id, parent_id, x, y, velocity, direction, health, target_id, launched]
attackers: columns are [id, x, y, velocity, direction, health, num of missiles, target_id]
attackers missiles: # columns are [id, parent_id, x, y, velocity, direction, health, target_id, launched]
